buildup.text: Multimodal models process text, images, audio, and video within one unified system.

discovery.text: Vision encoders convert images to embeddings that the language model can reason about.

twist.text: The model doesn't 'see' like humans â€” it matches image patterns to text descriptions.

climax.text: Gemini, GPT-4o, and Claude can all reason across text and images in a single conversation.

punchline.text: One model to see, hear, read, and respond.

quiz.question: What makes a model 'multimodal'?
options: It processes multiple types of input like text, images, and audio
